text: Bulgaria national volleyball team is the national volleyball team of Bulgaria. They have participated in the FIVB world league ever since 1994. Bulgaria played at the first world championship in 1949. == Honors == * Olympics: Silver medal (1980) * World Championship: Silver Medal (1970) - Bronze medal (1949, 1952, 1986, 2000) * World Cup: Bronze medal (2007) * European Championship: Silver medal (1951) == References == == Other websites == * BG Vollyball Category:National volleyball teams Category:Sports organizations of Bulgaria
title: Bulgaria men's national volleyball team
